DOC.brief_summary: The initial trial examine fish oil supplementation pregnancy could reduce risk pregnancy induce hypertension , intrauterine growth retardation , preterm birth pregnancy increase risk complication . The study design multi-centre clinical trial base 19 hospital seven country Europe .
DOC.brief_title: Fish Oil Trials Pregnancy Prevention Pregnancy Complications ( 'FOTIP ' )
DOC.criteria: There six subgroup different inclusion criterion : The low dose ( prophylactic ) section enrol woman 16 week gestation identify uncomplicated pregnancy , early pregnancy experience preterm delivery ( subgroup 1 ) Intrauterine growth retardation ( subgroup 2 ) pregnancy induce hypertension ( subgroup 3 ) Women identify twin pregnancy ( subgroup 4 ) The high dose ( 'therapeutic ' ) section enrol woman threaten preeclampsia ( subgroup 5 ) suspect intrauterine growth retardation current pregnancy ( subgroup 6 ) . Diabetes mellitus pregnancy Diagnosed severe fetal malformation hydrops current pregnancy Suspicion current pregnancy , occurrence earlier pregnancy , placental abruption Drug alcohol abuse Regular intake fish oil nonsteroidal antiinflammatory agent drug effect thombocyte function eicosanoid metabolism Allergy fish product .
